Package com.pb.sawdust.util.concurrent

Provides utilities for concurrent processing.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DnCRecursiveAction
    The DnCRecursiveAction provides a framework for "divide-and-conquer" RecursiveActions.
    DnCRecursivePrimitiveAction
    The DnCRecursivePrimitiveAction provides simple abstract RecursiveAction implementations for dealing with primitives.
    DnCRecursivePrimitiveAction.DnCRecursiveBooleanAction
    The DnCRecursiveBooleanAction class provides a "divide-and-conquer" RecursiveTask which deals with boolean values.
    DnCRecursivePrimitiveAction.DnCRecursiveByteAction
    The DnCRecursiveByteAction class provides a "divide-and-conquer" RecursiveTask which deals with byte values.
    DnCRecursivePrimitiveAction.DnCRecursiveCharAction
    The DnCRecursiveCharAction class provides a "divide-and-conquer" RecursiveTask which deals with char values.
    DnCRecursivePrimitiveAction.DnCRecursiveDoubleAction
    The DnCRecursiveDoubleAction class provides a "divide-and-conquer" RecursiveTask which deals with double values.
    DnCRecursivePrimitiveAction.DnCRecursiveFloatAction
    The DnCRecursiveFloatAction class provides a "divide-and-conquer" RecursiveTask which deals with float values.
    DnCRecursivePrimitiveAction.DnCRecursiveIntAction
    The DnCRecursiveIntAction class provides a "divide-and-conquer" RecursiveTask which deals with int values.
    DnCRecursivePrimitiveAction.DnCRecursiveLongAction
    The DnCRecursiveLongAction class provides a "divide-and-conquer" RecursiveTask which deals with long values.
    DnCRecursivePrimitiveAction.DnCRecursiveShortAction
    The DnCRecursiveShortAction class provides a "divide-and-conquer" RecursiveTask which deals with short values.
    DnCRecursiveTask<T>
    The DnCRecursiveTask provides a framework for "divide-and-conquer" RecursiveTasks.
    ForkJoinExamples  
    ForkJoinPoolFactory
    The ForkJoinPoolFactory class provides a simple factory for getting ForkJoinPools.
    IteratorAction<A>
    The IteratorAction class provides an IteratorTask for transfer functions which do not return values.
    IteratorTask<A,B>
    The IteratorTask class provides a ForkJoinTask which parallelizes actions on elements held in an iterator.
    LongCountDownLatch
    This is a countdown latch that uses longs instead of ints.
    Regulator
    The Regulator class is used to restrict access to a fixed, quantifiable resource.
    Smitty Deprecated
    Smitty.SmittyRecursiveAction Deprecated
    Smitty.SmittyRecursiveTask<T> Deprecated
    Smitty.SmittyTask<T> Deprecated
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Regulator.Availability
    The Availability enum represents the three availability states for a given resource request on a Regulator.

Package com.pb.sawdust.util.concurrent Description

Provides utilities for concurrent processing. Currently includes classes extending the fork-join functionality in Java 7.
